segments.text: I see the boy stretching his body upwards, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's done this before and knows what he's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl standing nearby, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, but they're taking a big risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman still drying dishes, unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy is going to make it or if he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they need to be more careful and not take such risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it this time, but they should be more cautious in the future.
segments.speaker: PAR
